params.serviceId: Off-chain reference to the service being purchased
params.timeoutSeconds: Time after which seller can claim if buyer doesn't respond

dispute(uint256).details: Simple model: if disputed before timeout, funds return to buyer

claimAfterTimeout(uint256).notice: Seller claims funds after timeout (buyer unresponsive)

createEscrow(address,uint256,uint256,byt.notice: Create a new escrow for a service purchase

isTimedOut(uint256).notice: Check if timeout has passed for an escrow

release(uint256).notice: Buyer releases funds to seller after service completion
